name: t1top

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ Fre, c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ct1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fre → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Fre ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))))

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fre → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Fre ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))))

body.origin:

-| wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ctop))

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fre → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ ⋃ c0 = ⋃ c0
⊣ d(hs0, c0)

|- wi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)

comment: A T_1 space is a topological space. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
